LanguageData.OverWallNutrientDispenser2W.label: Over-Wall Nutrient Paste Dispenser (Wide)
LanguageData.OverWallNutrientDispenser2W.description: A machine that synthesizes edible nutrient paste from organic feedstocks placed in adjacent hoppers. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay.
LanguageData.OverWallNutrientPaste.label: Over-Wall Nutrient Paste Dispenser
